name: 10pinMP
description:
10pinMP: Multiplayer Bowling is a simulation game designed to give a semi-realistic virtual bowling experience with your friends. With real-time multiplayer and a fully working scoring system, you'll be able to show off your skills (or lack thereof) in no time.

Multiplayer requires the host to port forward port 26420.

This is my first Godot project and so bugs may be present.
